title: 70 Carmine Gallo: Public Speaking Secrets That Moves Audiences
description:
You're in the middle and 50,000 people are waiting for you to speak.
What's coming up for you?
Are you shaky, nervous and unsure of yourself?
Are you prepared, alive and ready to leave the audience spell bound?
To learn more and get a resource list of everything mentioned in this show, go to www.lewishowes.com/70
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
